title: Backtracking – Generate Binary Strings
description: Print all binary strings of length n using backtracking.
explanation: Explores all possible combinations. Time Complexity: O(2^n). Space Complexity: O(n).

title: Backtracking – String Permutations
description: Find all permutations of a string using backtracking.
explanation: Try each character as the first character, recurse on the rest. Time Complexity: O(n!).
